title: Total number of employees of the LVMH Group worldwide 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Total number of employees has rose over the Year.
Total number of employees is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Total number of employees, of value 121289.0 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Total number of employees, of value 77302.0 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: Overall Total number of employees has increased over the Year.
